column2: "Your report came in. I'm sorry to hear about what happened; you did all you could. Please take some time to rest."
"Greetings. Is there something on your mind?"
"Ah, I just received a report from that person. Unfortunately, his results were... rather regrettable."
"You could say the only good thing about it... was that a report came back at all."
"Being sent to the front means a possibility of grave injury. In some situations, not everyone may be able to come home."
"While I'm always prepared to hear the worst, I end up asking myself if my instruction could have made a difference."
"It is as you say. Of course, I'm sure everyone is prepared to take on the risks involved..."
"No... thank you for your consideration, though. That kindness of yours is what moves the hearts of so many here."
"It is simply that, even if I think that I'm giving the best possible instructions at the time, after the fact I often discover much safer methods."
"As much as it pains me, I have to constantly evaluate tragic scenarios like that so I can give better instructions in the future."
"And ultimately, as a result, hopefully I can help decrease the number of such tragic reports. That is my wish right now."
"We've all put such heavy responsibilities upon you and Matoi."
"This will certainly be your hardest battle yet, but please... you absolutely must come back safely."
"This isn't an order. This is a request of a humble administrator that's known you two ever since you became ARKS."
